name: Fourspell Survivors Online
description: Join friends online to survive endless hordes of monsters in this online coop "survivors" game! Evolve your spells, defeat bosses and develop the best character builds and party formations. Cooperation is key to survive in this action roguelike with unique characters.

name: Free Bees
description: A brick-breaker reimagined with hexagons, honey, and heavy-duty chains! Free the bees by chaining together projectiles in unique visual settings using new brick-breaker mechanics. Create & share your own custom levels, chill with the freed-bees in the sanctuary, and, most importantly, FREE THE BEES!

name: From the Deep
description: A Seeker recalled to an abandoned Monastery on the Cosmic Shoreline. A cosmic evil lying in wait. Explore, investigate, and survive by channeling the psychic powers of the Cosmic Waters in this first-person, survival horror game.

name: Ghost Bros
description: Ghost Bros is a 1-4 player co-op ghost investigation game where you and your crew scour the globe for proof of the afterlife...and stream it for profit. Travel to real-life haunted destinations, search for the supernatural, use CPU companions, and build an audience as you risk your health for fame.

Customize your name, the relationship, and each of the love interests names. Features fully a mix of animated and non-animated content in this delightful visual novel.

description:
Introducing Soccerverse. A massively multiplayer, community-driven football management game.
Become a manager, agent, club owner, share trader, scout or any combination of these and more, in one huge persistent, open-ended game world competing against other players.
Experience a thriving football economy that uses blockchain technology to give you true realism, asset ownership and total control.

description:
We're about to light the world of Tower Defense on fire with Omega Royale!

With Omega Royale we've reinvented Tower Defense. Not only are we improving the gameplay, we're also setting the model for the next generation of games utilizing blockchains, by offering all our players a true free to play game where everyone has a chance to add value to their card collections!

name: League of Empires
description: League of Empires is the first ever true MMORTS game on blockchain. It offers a rich and immersive gameplay. Train and command your troops in stunning 3D wars! Form alliances, fortify your land, deploy different strategies and increase your defences to protect your treasures from enemies. Gather resources and train your army to build up your power and expand it into a mighty Empire.

description: Adds 6 new units to the game, 3 melee Golem units & 3 ranged gunpowder units. The gunpowder units make pew-pew sounds! Smokey and noisy! The first two units are recruited at Tier 2 (one golem and gunpowder turtle), two more unlock at Tier 3 (again one of each), and the last two at Tier 4 (one more golem and also bombards!).

description: After a violent tropical cyclone, the fish, shrimp, octopuses and other sea creatures find themselves flung out of the water… There's not a minute to lose! Use original tools to guide them to freedom! You'll need to think hard and act fast to save them all!

name: Cryptobots
description:
Cryptobots was the first play to earn game of its type in 2017, and we’ve been successfully operating it ever since. To create an even more engaging and deep gaming experience we are planning a major update to Cryptobots.
In Cryptobots you will be able to sign on and acquire rent bots without overcoming any significant financial barrier. Players can also join a built-in scholarship for free. On the other end, it increases the demand for NFTs in-game.

name: Dead of Night
description:
Dead of Night is a 2D platformer set in the world of Ancient Greek mythology.

The game was developed for the Enix International Entertainment Contest in the Fall of 1996. The released version of Dead of Night – which is only a demo – only contains the first quest given by Zeus to Heropheles: to slay the Hydra and retrieve the map of the Underworld. The continuation of the story is hinted at but was apparently never done, otherwise the game is feature-complete.

name: Amplz Boss Fights
description: Fight different bosses in different ways in this goofy art style game. Several difficult bosses from memes to twitch streamers. Find an approach to each boss, with rapture watch the prologues and endings to each level. Good luck dodging every attack and every event

name: Border Wars
description:
Commander, you are needed to take control of your soldiers in the new army games. You are able to command troops ranging from pistol wielding units to snipers, tanks, machinegun jeeps and artillery. Inspired from some of the best military games on mobile which will challenge your skills in battle simulator.
Players of battle simulator and military games will love the trench warfare like style of each mission with warpips like strategy games. You can deploy your troops like trench battles but also manage money like classic RTS games. The gameplay is styled to play like ww2 and ww3 strategy games with trench warfare like mechanics.
Fight on the borders of your country in a battle simulator of infantry units. Or command missions in the forests and fields of your country with trench defense. You must protect your home from the enemy in battles that take place in the harsh weather of the desert and finally you must command your troops in tank games where large tank battles take place in the city.
The goal of each mission in the military games is to destroy the enemy base or survive until reinforcements arrive. To win you will need to manage your money carefully and perform strategic advancement to win all the campaign missions. Mini warriors can be called to the battlefield by pressing their button from the soldier panel. Money is earned by killing enemy soldiers. Make careful use of tanks and artillery to win the battlefield. At the end you will have to fight the enemy general and defeat him by destroying the boss tank.
A lot of work and effort was put in developing this project so that it can be enjoyed and played like classic ww2 games and modern ww3 games combined. The gameplay of both these military games combined makes this a fun and one of the more challenging campaign games. I hope you will enjoy playing this and if you do please leave feedback here as it encourages me to add even more campaign missions to the game.

name: The Barker & Mustard Files
description:
The Barker & Mustard Files is a 2D/3D Mystery-Adventure game where you play as a dashingly daring dynamic duo of Dog Detectives by the names of Harvey Barker and Frank Mustard.

Point and click your way through the luxurious Clydesdale Hotel, meet the multitude of suspicious sweeties and dubious degenerates contained within, and solve a wide variety of puzzles on your journey to unravel the mysterious disappearance of the bashful Beaver, Stuart "Flappy" Brown.

It's a tough gig, being a detective. And it's tougher still when nobody gives you the respect you deserve. Harvey and Frank have been pounding the proverbial pavement for years, doing big-time work for small-time pay, only to get credit snatched away by the (sometimes literal) Vultures at the Scarlet City Police Department.

But all of that changed when the case of a lifetime fell right into their laps... along with a couple of trigger-happy, gun-toting thugs. But a little bullet-themed office redecoration courtesy of those two-bit toughs wasn't about to scare Harvey Barker and Frank Mustard off the biggest case (and biggest paycheque) they've ever had...

So grab a good snack, your beverage of choice, and head on down to the Clydesdale Hotel... because it's time to crack this case wide open!

Unlike those other games, Rummy has the right combination of luck, your skills, and intelligence while keeping that magic feel! Rummy Club is the best board game ever made by Ahoy Games, creators of the most popular Turkish board game: Okey.
Rummy Club is an offline, tile-based rummy game, where you can challenge yourself and develop your skills and intellect! Rummy Club allows manipulation of all tiles on the table placed by players, this gives you unlimited move possibilities.

name: Legend of Rune
description: Legend of Rune is a fantasy BL / gay visual novel game. It follows the adventures of Rune, a young fire mage who has been destined to destroy the world. On his journey to escape his destiny, Rune meets four other mages that wish to aid him in his travels. The game also features a puzzle-battle system, where battles are fought through a tile-matching game.

name: Sakura Tempest
description:
You will be playing Shōtarō, an average boy trying to survive his college years. Through his first year at his new college, many adventures await him – especially once he gets involved with four handsome upperclassmen!
Will he spent summer in the mountains with his childhood friend? Or train with the sports club? Or maybe go to the beach with the student council? Or get in trouble with a certain delinquent?

name: Way to a Vampire's Heart
description:
Being one of the youngest Vampire Hunters, Lucian Lockhart didn't expect to encounter one of those bloodthirsty creatures in his lifetime. After all, vampires were on the brink of extinction and no one heard about a single apparition of them for more than fifteen years.

However, the opportunity unexpectedly appears and Lucian finds himself face to face with the enemy he had only known from told stories and books. As if fighting a vampire for the first time wasn't astounding enough, Lucian also discovers one thing about his family's past that could tear apart everything he had believed to be true.

name: Hungry Penguin
description: Eat all the fish you can as you dive through the cold waters of Antartica. But be careful! As global warming keeps getting worse, so are the odds of surviving.

name: Agents of Mayhem: Safeword Agent Pack
description: If you can build it, she can hack it. Safeword has little patience for stupidity, even less for Legion. Assemble an army of cybersecurity experts, it doesn’t matter. The woman’s a walking infrastructure threat, and nothing—from your email password to your doomsday weapon—is safe.

name: The Sacred Pools
description:
The Sacred Pools is an unreleased FMV game by Sega, planned for release in 1997.
Thanks to Joe Cain, former game tester at Sega of America and associate producer David Gray it was uncovered and uploaded in October 2022.

name: Incur Survival

description: Unique mix of turn-based strategy and adventure. Defend the town of Glint Rock against radioactive giant ants! Dr. Mill is a geologist that came to town to examine the recent meteor crash. Now he has to convince the towns folk that something's going on.

description: The Mysterious Man has visited Portia once again! The eccentric businessman spends his time traveling the world while collecting fashionable clothes from different cities. During his recent visit to Portia, he decided to gift several residents new, top of the line, trendy outfits!

name: Nemesis Island
description: Tired of Zombie survival games, this game is different. No zombies, but you will have to try and SURVIVE THIS! A Mystery/Horror survival game, with base building and unique "enemies" Hunting, building, exploring, surviving Early Access - Mega updates, expansions and features coming

name: Odd Woods
description: Odd Woods is a survival crafting game in a forest environment. Build your base during the day to withstand the attacks of horror creatures at night. Explore, farm and hunt wildlife to survive another day.

name: Orya: Broken World
description: Orya is an RPG focused on turn-based combat and progression. Explore Orya, a vibrant handpainted world full of mysteries and an incredible story. Every decision is important, be it how you fight your battles, the quests you take, or the friends/enemies you make. Choose your path wisely.

description: For a limited time, instantly add a Weapon, Customizations, Boosters and more to your Arsenal to repel the Sentient invasion and fight The New War. Evolve your look with new Protovyre gear, which will unlock additional Customizations as you play.

description: The game uses elements such as sandbox and tower defense. Players need to upgrade their bases and cultivate partners to resist the invasion of zombies. You can also team up with your friends to explore new maps, search for materials, and continue in this waste earth world.

name: Werewolf Tycoon
description:
Become the Big Bad Wolf of Werewolf Park in this werewolf stealth simulation game.
Eat as many people as you can, but pace yourself, try not to be seen, and do not let witnesses escape! After all, things could get tricky if too many people become aware of your existence!
Happy munching!

name: Undertale Last Breath Renewed
description: Sin descripción

name: Tim_
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Book: Cats Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Triz: Sacred Geometry Puzzles
description: Disentangle the color web of mysterious geometric interweaving and discover fascinating hypnotic shapes. Distract from reality in the world of pure abstract forms and bright subtly changing colors. Give in to the meditative atmosphere and go with the flow of serene tranquility. Modern abstract art comes to life and turns into puzzles!

name: Tramp Simulator: Survival City Full
description:
Live the life of a homeless person, lost and lonely, with Tramp Simulator: Survival City in 3D!
Fight for your life on the city streets with other tramps, search for food and money, build shelters and craft weapons and tools playing this homeless survival simulator. It’s not like being a survivor spending time on lost Tropical Island – picturesque ocean, juicy fruit and nice weather… Today your goal is to stay alive in concrete jungles! Your opponents aren’t wild predators, tropical rains or other dangers you can face spending time on the survival island – fight against cop or hide from them not to be arrested, rob and steel to provide yourself with food, dig through rubbish to find weapons or useful survival tools! Сheck Tramp Simulator: Survival City - great homeless survival simulator for those who are ready for extreme adventures! Rob, steal, hunt, battle and explore!

name: Lost in the Woods: Adventure Game
description:
Enter a deceptively beautiful world where secrets lay hidden at every turn… and nothing is as it seems.
You must search. You must explore. You must use your wits to map out and navigate the woods. Find hidden puzzles to complete to progress through the game. And ultimately escape from being Lost in the Woods!

name: Off the Rails
description:
Off the Rails is a tabletop game designed by Andrew Platt. Build tracks and race Minecarts under the Great Mountain to collect as many Jewels as you can before the ground underneath collapses into the Chasm, burying all the wealth forever!
Off the Rails is a strategic, competitive 2-8 player tabletop game with tile placement, risk / reward mechanics and tons of fun for everyone!
This app lets you score easily after the game is complete.

name: Brigands and Barbarians
description:
Brigands and Barbarians is the RPG that let's you tap your way to treasure and old-school adventure! Choose from five avatars including Barbarians, Brigands, Archer, Wizard, and Sorceress. Defeat the evil goblins and dragons as you cleanse the lands of Charedon of their evil stench!
Only you through the power of your nimble fingers can save this land. Only your quick touch can slay the mighty dragon! Wait no more and dare to enter this land of adventure!

name: Ape vs. Caveman
description:
Total retro arcade action!
Introducing... Caveman! Caveman looking for Stonehenge. Caveman like Stonehenge. But caveman no like evil monkey, sticky cactus, bad bird, pointy rhino or falling rocks! These things bad. Help Caveman reach Stonehenge and advance to the next level.
A classic favorite, in new glorious 3D! Caveman must jump over falling rocks that are hurled down on him by a giant ape. Luckily, there are other jungle animals willing to help!
This incredible new action-packed game has awesome music and graphics with a classic retro feel.

name: Apache 3D Sim Flight Simulator
description:
Enjoy a fully featured combat flight simulator and join over 1.500.000 players.
Apache 3D Sim brings in the game such incredible detailed processing of a combat helicopter with a unique physics and weapon system that has not been here yet.

name: Swamp Stomp
description:
The Swamps of Pangea are full of fantastic fruits - the key to eternal life. But you are not alone in your quest to harvest these sweet treasures...
Go Bananas (and Pineapples!) with Swamp Stomp. As Fearless Frank you romp through the swamp collecting fruit. To thwart you in this task, the marauding Green Gobblers scour the swamp trying to knock you out and steel your bananas. You must climb Vine Ladders, jump across ravines, RIDE log lifts and navigate each level to WIN! Beware stompy the fearsome gorilla. He will stomp on your head given half a chance so watch out. Good luck!

name: Checkers Lounge 3D
description: Checkers Lounge 3D brings you one of the most famous board games to your device. Tip and slide on the screen to rotate the view in all three dimensional angles. Use two fingers to zoom in and out. Simply drag & drop the game pieces to the desired location. Play locally against friends, against the computer or against people all over the Internet. Compete with the world and improve your world ranking position. Do you make it into the top ten?

name: LowRes Collection
description: This collection contains 5 simple arcade games with 64x64-pixel resolution, 16 colors and chiptune music.

name: Haggis
description:
From the green hills of the Scottish highlands comes a card game stuffed full of fun. The goal is simply to play all of your cards first. But beware, hidden in the misty crags are subtle strategies that require mastery of tricky combinations, wild cards and... "bombs".
Sean Ross designed Haggis over a number of years, extensively testing over thousands of hands to create a very engaging and balanced game.
The iOS edition was tastefully crafted to allow you to play 2-3 player matches of Haggis against AI players, with automated scoring and built in reserve mechanics to allow you to sort and manage your hand. You can play a short game to 250 points, or a longer game to 350 points--whichever suits your mood. And the great thing is the ability to pick up and continue play wherever you left off if you need to take a break, or get back to work.

name: Endless Nights RPG
description:
Endless Nights is a roguelike rpg that lets you play your way, with a skills-based system that recognizes the actions of your character in the game and develops those skills. This means you can choose to use a sword, or a mace, use magic or pray to the gods, and you never need worry about picking a class and no visiting trainers to 'learn' new skills.
You just play the game and the skills you use will increase as you play, and when you've learned enough of a skill, new skill trees and abilities will become available.
Endless Nights is a role-playing game in the rogue-like tradition, which means randomized adventure areas, random dungeons and a different adventure each time you play the game. The TitanFire RPG system used in the game provides for strategic combat by putting an emphasis on defense and on developing strategies to break through the defenses of your opponent during combat.
A tweak to the rogue-like style is the Profile system, which allows for a certain amount of permanence with the inclusion of profiles that allow you to carry over some gold or gems to a new character.

name: Dummy Defense
description:
The spin-off of SimplePhysics. Protect your dummy from explosions, boulders, spiked walls, and more!
Use the blueprints editor to design a structure that will protect your dummy, Melvin, from some random danger. You'll have to work with the available materials. Most of the time you'll use wood, sometimes you'll use concrete, but you must always use your most important asset: your brain.
A wise person once said: "An engineer is someone who can do for a dime what any fool can do for a dollar." In Dummy Defense, your design must not only be strong enough, it must be cheap enough to win. Building cheaper structures will earn you more stars on a level.
Create your design in seconds with the blueprints editor. If you make a mistake, simply tap the Undo button. Zoom in and out by pinching the screen and pan the view using a two finger drag.
While testing, you can see how the strain is distributed across your design. Areas that are under immense strain are colored bright red, while other areas are colored green. This allows you to find and fix problem areas in your design.
The slow motion slider lets you slow things down so you can see how your design is failing, and it is also incredibly fun to watch explosions destroying your design in slow motion.

name: Marble Watchness
description:
With 3D isometrics levels, stunning graphics and world ranking to challenge everyone, this tribute to Marble Madness will enjoy your Apple Watch!
Goal of the game is to move in the maze to collect the coloured balls.

name: World to Conquer
description:
World to Conquer is a turn-based game of swords and sorcery. Command brave soldiers, fierce samurai, archers, and sneaky ninja in tactical battles. Smite foes with fiery blasts of magic and lightning. Breath life into trees and rocks.
World to Conquer, Shadow of the Kraul is a follow-up to the award winning 2002 udev games contest entry, lovingly redesigned from the ground up for tactical on-the-go gaming.

name: Z is for Zombie
description:
While on an expedition to some recently discovered ruins near Machu Picchu in Peru, world renowned archaeologist Max Jones is bitten by an unknown insect. Hours later he dies. His interns transport Max’s body back to camp where an ambulance takes him to the morgue. Two miles from the hospital they are attacked. 48 Hours later all of South America is under martial law.
The rest of the world turns attempts to turn a blind eye to the events happening in Peru, but as the infection spreads news reports begin to leak out. 72 Hours after Max dies, the infection is global.
Hoping to stock up before it is too late, you decide to make a quick run to the mall to gather supplies. That was your first mistake.

name: Space Agency 2138
description:
It’s time to discover a whole new Solar System.
Space Agency 2138 is set in a not too distant future where you can build rockets, fly to other worlds, and mine for resources. Use those resources to build more stuff or sell them to make money.
The larger your organisation gets, the harder it becomes to manage. Will you be able to keep on top of it all?

name: Minibash
description:
A strategic online 2D Fighting Game.
Free today with App of the Day HD
Download the app "App of the Day HD" and discover every day a paid app that becomes free for 24 hours!

name: Genesis: Human Destiny
description:
Genesis: Human Destiny is a space saga about the eternal search, phantom hope, and new menace. Faced with an invincible enemy, humanity sends more and more spacecrafts to foreign galaxies outside the Solar System, trying to stop the approach of inevitable Armageddon.
Genesis offers you a combination of genres that will magnetize you as a black hole: text quest, spaceship simulator, survival, adventure, and rogue-like RPG.
Solve a hundred urgent problems and riddles: how to catch the One who got out of the Xenobiologist's body? What does the phrase in 327 human languages received from space ​​mean? How to identify a cyborg among the human beings? Why do engines go dead after meeting with the Flying Dutchman? Can space vampires really cause blind sight? Who is to blame and what is to be done?
Buy, equip and upgrade your spaceships to create an invincible space fleet!
Become the guardian of the galaxy! Heroic astronauts are waiting for your orders!
Send your cruisers and storm-troopers beyond the horizon and to a trip to the Moon, Mars and thousands of other planets in still nameless nebulae and star systems!
Overcome the gravity laws and show how the Earth empire strikes back! Neither vacuum, nor dark energy or antimatter, nor comets infected by intelligent cyber viruses will interrupt your odyssey!
Complete your own star trek to the end and decide whether the human civilization will live or die!

name: Empires II
description:
Awaken your instincts and conquer the world! Develop a war strategy, determine a country’s strengths and weaknesses, fortify your lands and dominate!
From the moment you select your country of origin, every decision becomes strategic. How will you spend your budget? How will you secure your borders? Will you defeat the enemy or team up to take over the world? In a game of tactics, play as one of 9 regions and wage war against 165 countries. Venture around the large-scale map, sail across oceans and battle your way through victory and defeat.
“He who knows when he can fight and when he cannot, will be victorious.” - Sun Tzu
The goal is world domination, and the struggle for power has never been more fun.

name: Titus: Politics is not a game
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a politician?
Play the role of Titus, an agoraphobic watchmaker who decides to achieve his dream of becoming the president of Wealland.

name: Microarcade ApplePie
description:
Microarcade ApplePie is a set of 8 simple activities, where you're baking virtual pies step by step. From picking up the apples to keeping heat in the traditional East Slavic oven.

The Microarcade franchise intends providing simple, yet diverse activities to those longing for casual and hypercasual gaming. They’re fully suitable for kids.

name: Haccer
description:
Haccer is a fast arcade digging game where you avoid bomb explosions and dig further deeper down.
Can you get through the randomly generated environments and get the highest score?

name: DungeonSquad
description:
A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss.
Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory.
Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss.
You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own.
You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you,
armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices.
Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Archdemons,
and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies.

name: Apollo: A Dream Odyssey
description: Apollo: A Dream Odyssey is an emotional journey about a young girl's search of meaning, self-reflection, and lost dreams.

name: PixelSlime
description:
PixelSlime is a simple action role-playing game! structured like 8-bit dots.
Lots of items, magics, but super easy play!

name: Mirrors
description:
Mirrors is a light reflecting puzzle game inspired by The Mummy and the Ancient Egyptian method of reflecting light with mirrors.
You play as an adventurer searching for treasure in a vast number of tombs. To navigate through the tombs, reflect beams of light around using the mirrors that are at your disposal. Hit the receptacle with the light and the door to the next tomb will become unlocked. The deeper into the ruins you venture, the more dangerous it becomes. Overcome obstacles, avoid traps and defeat enemies while attempting to complete each tomb and retrieve the Canopic Jars.
When you're done searching for treasure there are other ways to put your adventuring skills to good use. Why not put yourself to the test in the timed mode? Think you're better than a Pharaoh? Try your hand at creating your own levels with the Level Creator, then head on over to the Curator's Well and show them off to your friends.
Good luck, adventurer!

name: Blokshot Halloween
description: A hauntingly familiar game to those who've played Blokshot Evolution. This Halloween inspired EVILution will have your pulse racing as you rapidly take out mummys, ghouls, monsters and more! Blokshot EVILution is a chance to play the original game with a little Holiday spirt.

name: Rhythm Stones
description:
1. Cross the 3D stepping stones to the beat!
Rhythm Stones is a 3D rhythm game in which you cross the moving stepping stones to the beat. The stepping stones move in various types of 3D space; flat, cylindrical, spherical, and random!
2. Simple controls, but hardcore difficulty!
Rhythm Stones lets you touch anywhere to play, but can you get past all of the difficult beats until the end?
3. But even if you fail, special items allow you to succeed over time!
The more you lose a level, the more health-increasing items appear. No matter how difficult the stage is, if you keep trying you will surely succeed!
4. Enjoy 55 songs in various genres!
Rhythm Stones consists of 55 stages (including 5 tutorials), and each stage consists of a different song in various genres such as rock, funk, jazz, EDM, acoustic, etc.
Contact:

name: Qubd
description:
Test your math, addition, subtraction, multiplication and observational skills in this fun and simple game of guessing how many Cubes are missing from the 5x5x5 Cube volume.
Sharpen your mind and give your brain a workout while completing ever challenging levels.

name: 6-in-1 Board Game Club
description: The Board Game Club collection containing 6 classic games including Chess, Backgammon, Checkers, Othello, Connect Four, and Ludo. Personalizing players and challenging built-in three levels of AI Players make it combines nonstop entertainment, endless replayability.

name: Doggo Patrol
description: Play now this great game and enjoy hours of fun!

name: Shankstars
description: You've been chosen to assemble an elite team of golfers to conquer courses the likes of which this world has never seen. Tee off on your own or compete head-to-head against other players as you level up and unlock new characters, imaginative courses and increasingly epic adventures!

name: Dark Steel
description:
Shatter your chains, fight, and seek revenge against those who kept you enslaved for years. Knight, Warrior or Assassin, choose your class wisely and face hundreds of enemies in this fabulous medieval combat game with impressive 3D graphics and realistic physics.
Make the most of your mobile device and fight as if you were playing on console in an over-the-shoulder 3D perspective that will make you feel like you’re inside the game. Control your character with extremely simple gestures on your touchscreen, moving your character as you see fit and executing different attacks and combos.
Confront other players in multiplayer mode to obtain exclusive weapons and armor or work with them during the temporary events to defeat the Guardian of the Tower.

name: Keltis HD
description:
Follow the intricate paths of Celtic stones in an exciting race for the highest score.
Play numbered cards to move your figures as far as possible along the colored paths of stone and try to collect valuable wishing stones and bonus points on your way to beat your opponents!
A clever strategy playing your cards, collecting tiles and choosing paths and some luck of the draw lead to victory. Play as many cards as possible in the right order - but never lose track of your opponents' tactics!

name: Lama by Reiner Knizia
description:
Finally, the "casual" card game with cult factor is now also playable as an app.
Every llama knows the most important rule of all: Discard all minus points!
Get rid of your cards so as not to collect any chips. Do you fold, or do you hope to draw a suitable card? Decide! At the end, the winner is the one who could most casually avoid the minus points.

name: Marching Band Simulator
description: Create marching band shows just like the pros do! Marching Band Simulator is like having drill writing software right on your phone! Create whatever you can imagine, control everything from the dots to the uniform, and share your shows easily to be judged by other designers! So what are you waiting for, we have a championship to win!

name: Nozoku Rush
description: Subtract tiles down to zero to clear them off the board. Maximize your score with big combos and show your friends who's boss on the leaderboards!

name: Retro Basketball Coach 2023
description:
Coaching has never been so simple – draft and trade players, manage your line-up, and lead your team to a playoff title! With Retro Basketball Coach 2023 you can turn your favorite city into a dynasty over multiple seasons, and any fan young or old can experience the joy of guiding their team to glory!

Complete with stylish retro visuals for every team, simple menus allow you to focus on picking your best five players and keep things fresh by managing your team’s energy levels throughout the fixture list and using your entire roster. If your team isn’t up to the challenge you can trade your way to your own ‘all-star’ team in pursuit of success, or see how much your players improve by spending time out on court!

name: Flick Tennis
description: Flick Tennis is the only tennis game that provides you the entire depth of a game of tennis just like in real-life tennis - its unlike anything you seen or played before!

name: Llamagotchi
description:
Are you ready for llama fun?
Your llama needs to get to the top of a mountain! Will you help? Spend days playing games, feeding, and taking care of your llama. Build a barn and gain trust with your llama friend before traveling up the mountain together.
Llamagotchi is a solo developed indie game, every download helps me to continue development to make Llamagotchi even better. Please spread the word to family and friends!

name: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
description: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night is a cancelled port of the game of the same name for the Game.com.

name: Hatsune Miku VR: 5 Songs pack 2
description: 5 new songs and dances for Miku and a new stage too!

name: Hatsune Miku VR: 5 Songs pack 3
description: 5 new songs and dances for Miku and a new stage too!

name: Hatsune Miku VR: 5 Songs pack 1
description: Adds 5 new songs, with both normal and hard difficulty: Alien Alien, Starry Song, Love Trial, Future Teleportation, Teo.

name: Crordle
description: A Wordle clone for Playdate

name: Broken Pearl
description: Spiritual successor to Twin Tiger Shark

name: Jetman Hero: Jetpack Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Interstellar Travel Package
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Jam Steel Titans 2: Inverse Truck Pack
description: This truck pack includes 4 Monster Jam trucks based on the popular Spinmaster Inverse Truck Series!

name: Death End Re;Quest: Dungeon Re;Quest Pack
description: The Dungeon re;Quest Pack unlocks 1 additional quest and 4 additional dungeons to explore!

name: Project Warlock 2-pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Escalation Pack
description: New unit types for all factions enter the fray with the Escalation Pack. Each of the new units brings something new to their faction, from superior firepower to new exceptional abilities.

name: Orchestra: The Brass Fate
description: Sin descripción

name: Menagerie II: Presentable Liberty
description: You have been imprisoned without being told why. All you can hear day in day out is the faint ticking of a clock in your cell. That is, until the first of 5 fateful days begins.

name: Pendulo Adventure Pack
description: Pendulo Adventure pack includes 5 beautifully produced adventure games, with rich scenarios, ever-present humour and captivating puzzles.

name: Necromunda: Hired Gun - Hellhound Pack
description: The Hellhound pack for Necromunda: Hired Gun comes with unique cosmetics for your knife, outfit, and mastiff. Put the fear into your prey before you croak & with your rusty knife and midnight hound. Tonight, Death stalks the hive.

name: Evil West: Signature Edition
description:
Evil West – Signature Edition includes:
- An exclusive artwork by artist Gabz as a numbered laminated wooden frame (artwork printed on wood)
- A certificate of authenticity hand-signed by the artist
- A physical copy of the game for the platform of your choice using Gabz’s artwork as an exclusive box art
- Wild Wild East Skin Pack DLC

name: The Surge 2: Jericho's Legacy Gear Pack
description: Expand your The Surge 2 experience with the Jericho's Legacy Gear Pack and get access to 3 new armor sets. Fight your way out of the city with the brutally stylish beast Tank Buster, the sleek Kyoko Hacker Suit and Jericho's official Firetails Mascot! Find the enemies wearing them, cut them off and equip them for yourself!

name: The Surge 2: Public Enemy Weapon Pack
description: Expand your The Surge 2 experience with the Public Enemy Weapon Pack and get access to 13 brand new weapons. From pillaged CREO equipment to nanite-infected staves and recycled rotor blades, find the enemies that equip them, cut them off and equip them for yourself in your fight for Jericho City!

name: MiniPoly.io
description: MiniPoly.io is a movement-based first person shooter game with a lot of weapons, skins and customisation

name: Cosmic Coliseum
description: Fight for your freedom as you battle through wave after wave of alien adversaries. Destroy enemy fighters and collect XP to raise your level and become more powerful. Combine your skills and abilities with a huge range of power-ups to become the ultimate champion.

name: Clean Energy Creatures
description: Clean Energy Creatures is an action packed 2d action-adventure video game about cute, disc-golf loving, alien creatures summoned to earth to install solar panels, battle the Coal Baron and survive the impacts of climate disasters along the way.

name: Chroma Circuit
description: The far-future painter-racer! A single/multiplayer party racing game that has you painting boosting pads on the racetrack as you color the world of Synthara, 1,000 years into a world that isn't an apocalypse for once.

name: Chompy Chomp Chomp Party
description: Invite your friends and family to join you for a Chompy Chomp Chomp Party. A chaotic and fun local multiplayer game for up to 8 players that will bring joy and laughter to the room.

name: Chimeral Fantasy
description: Explore a fantasy world, assemble a party of quirky characters you meet along the way, and fight monsters in turn based tactical combat! Set between the "real" world and the fantastical dreams of a young girl, you must help save the king in her dreamland- and maybe help to save her ill father, too.

name: Chilljong
description: Chilljong is an endless adventure for lovers of puzzles and unhurried gameplay without limits! An unusual hybrid of genres in the style of mahjong connect will delight fans of the genre.

name: Cannon Royale
description: Cannon Royale is a card-based up to 4-player free-for-all 'Multiply or Release' game. Spin the wheel to get cards with unique abilities such as getting extra shots, multipliers, shields and more. Play solo to unlock new leagues and new gear to customize your equipment with or play with your friends!

name: Bunni Gunni Classic
description: They took your kids... Take their lives! Bunni Gunni Classic is a much needed polishing for the game jam game made in 4 days!

name: Broken In Time
description: Broken In Time is an action/adventure Turn based RPG. You (Titus) will explore different dimensions, solve puzzles, fight demons and monsters and ally with the other hero's around the multiverse!

name: Barrel Full of Monkeys
description: Run from monkeys, hold onto ammo, and search for an exit! Can you escape the maze?

name: Astrid: Reverie
description: In the near future, the 'Mindscape' allows you to enter the depths of your mind and relive your memories. Haunted by strange hallucinations, Astrid feels her life breaking down around her. Help Astrid face her fears in this horror-mystery adventure that combines 3D gameplay with FMV elements.

name: Aeon Wars: Maschinen Crisis
description: Aeon Wars: Maschinen Crisis is a turn-based tactical multiplayer wargame featuring collectible miniatures set in an original sci-fi universe where you battle with your friends on epic diorama-style terrains. Collect models and assemble them into armies. Play with friends in PvP or in PvE coop scenarios. Outside of play, enjoy your Collector Space and customize your models: swap parts and gear or paint new color schemes.

name: Noroware Cycle
description: Mayuhara City, Tokyo. The wounds of the mass suicide event of Mayuhara Academy from eight years ago have finally begun to heal. The rumors of the “Mayuhara Curse” are still whispered amongst the students.

name: The Longest Road on Earth: World Tour Bundle
description:
This World Tour Bundle includes:
• The Longest Road on Earth
• The Longest Road on Earth bundle exclusive soundtrack
• 3 master tracks – perfect for remixes!
• A selection of chords and lyrics sheets
• A behind-the-scenes documentary about the development of The Longest Road on Earth and its soundtrack
• An art book chalked full of stunning pixel-art

name: Arena Chaos
description: Arena Chaos is a 2D platform shooter where you have to fend off attacks.

name: Saving Healer
description: Saving healer is a minimalistic puzzle game where you need to finish an ambush of enemies in just one turn.

name: Mirages
description: Mirages is a 3D narrative and horror game with folk stories. One night, seven brides headed to the Captain Mansion but strayed into a place full of ghosts - Regret City. Horror haunts the small town. Due to destiny, actors, warlords, and offspring of the town are drawn in. They are closer to truth.

name: B-17 Flying Fortress the Bloody 100th
description: Manage and take control of the 10-man crew of a B-17 Flying Fortress as they attempt to complete 25 harrowing missions inspired by the real-life battles of The Bloody 100th Bomber group.

name: The Last of Them
description: Complete missions across different regions to stop the infection. ️ Promote your rank to unlock new weapons. Make radio calls for for air aid, supply packages, etc.

name: Vacoo: The Adventure in Garbage City
description: Single-player 2D platformer with metroidvania and puzzle elements.Discover this amazing new world has been drawn by our artists from scratch.Fend off the enemy, climb into the most secret places, learn the rules of this city and finally save your friend.

name: Summon Elemental
description: The ancient forest was invaded by evil creatures, Brave summoner, pray for the power of elements, prepare to meet fierce and brutal opponents! Mix different elements to create a unique element creation! Defeat the attacking monster, obtain rare props, and strengthen the power of Elemental!

name: Redaction
description: Powered by Unreal Engine 4, Redaction is a fast-paced, 4-person FPS squad-based PVE looter shooter set in a post-apocalyptic dystopian setting. Early Access coming in late 2022. Wishlist now to lock in a low low price on launch!

name: Alien Town Invasion
description: Sci fi survival based game.

name: Cave Crawlers
description: Cave Crawlers is a 1-10 player rogue lite set deep underground in a system of randomly generated caves. Players use weapons, spells, and talents to defeat the unique bosses and enemies found in each biome.

name: Hell's Mouth
description: Stoner Fueled Singleplayer RPG set in a city inspired by Helmond. Become the most OG smoker there is and build a weed empire in the society of Hell's Mouth. Fight enemies in the real-time combat system. Roam the open world while completing quests you run into.

name: Appleocalypse
description: Find all the apples, gain their powers, and discover your purpose in this small world you live in! Fly! Climb! Control toys! Rob a bank? You decide in this 2D platformer and find all the different apple abilities!

name: Margo: On The Brink
description: Dive into sundered worlds of "The Brink" in search for truth in this 2D turn-based RPG. Draw strength from mysterious beings called the Lost Whispers and pay the ultimate price to recover the long lost truth.

name: The Lik
description: "The Lik" is a horror story about a father who came to the temple with the last hope of saving his daughter. But now she is not the only one who needs help... You will have to get to know the temple better to make the right decision when the time comes... If, of course, you want to survive.

name: Skirmishers
description: Rally your warriors to fight alongside you, rescue your friends, bolster your troops and fight for supremacy.

name: BadSmith
description: We play as a young blacksmith who looks after the forge of his father, who disappeared no one knows where.

name: The Woods
description: Explore, build, craft and survive on a mysterious forest island.

name: Rebellion
description: A puzzle-RPG with a humorous take on the government's overreach in 2020. Collect pens and paper to write letters Collect keys to access houses Click on people to view their activities Visit a writing desk to write letter Deliver letters to people to build support Sleep to lower suspicion

name: Crime Cracker
description: In the game, the player will play as Jiajun and team up with Xiaomei to complete the missions from Captain Zhang. There are total eight chapters in the game. Chapter 1 to 4 take place in the mall and the streets, our heroes need to save the hostages and defeat the robbers of the Y-Reagent.

name: Nothing Can
description: A minimalist, difficult puzzle platformer. Help two souls cross the boundaries of their dimensions and rejoin by solving progressively more challenging puzzles. Control both souls or play co-op with a friend.

name: Mind of the Eyes
description: "Mind of the Eyes" is a 3D platformer with an open, enchanting world the player can explore freely. With the lovable and stubborn Nimmi, you solve puzzles and prove your dexterity to free the mountain from great harm and learn the truth about the fireflies.

name: Fright Knight Legend
description: Fright Knight Legend is an action packed beat 'em up where you embark on a journey to save the cursed Kingdom of Brightmore, narrated by the Wizard. You'll fight your way through the hordes of enemies and need to avoid the traps set along the way to find the gems scattered throughout the land.

name: Schwarzwald
description: Hunted like prey, solve tricky situations and collect items to get yourself to safety. But watch out, the demon isn't so easily beat and your instincts WILL betray you.

name: Starway: BaRaider
description: This is a VR action shooting game themed in science fiction. Mechanical frenzy is coming! Players have to teleport to survive from thousands of bullets.

name: SCP: Facility
description: SCP: Facility is a PvP - Strategy online multiplayer game, where you, class-d, scientists, and more, are trapped in a 4-layer underground containment facility after a containment breach, with the Anomalies loose. Will you be able to escape to safety? there's only one way to find that out.

name: Hero Z TPS
description: It's a fun and cool sci-fi shooting game. You are a hero in the zombie world.

name: Memories of Planet
description: A 2.5D scrolling Beat them up game. The combination of classical hardcore and modern pop, free combination of various skill programs and props plug-ins. Support Online Multyplayer, experience the innovative mode of "cooperation and competition".

name: Secret Battle
description: "Secret Battle" is a novel connection + match-3 + blasting gameplay and mild character strength development game!

name: City of Elves
description: City of Elves is a fairytale strategy game in which you take a role of a ruler of an elven empire. Build a tree fortress and defend your territory. Develop technology, upgrade your armies, play turn-based scenarios, and expand your territory in this fantasy world of magic!

name: Truer than You
description: Truer than You is a choice-heavy visual novel, in which you’re hired as an actor to play roles in real life situations. Because of your appearance you can play almost any role - but can you separate reality from fiction?

name: Overkill
description: Overkill is a fast-paced action rogue-lite game in a dark, fantastic medieval setting. You will fight against enraged monsters and enhance your characters' abilities for the ultimate massacre. Killing is not enough; you need to Overkill your enemies to show your utmost anger.

name: Astra Defender
description: Blast through enemies, build defenses, launch fighters, and upgrade your way to victory in this fast-paced space shooter/action RTS hybrid.

name: Breath of the Gods
description: Knowing the true potential of humanity, the True Gods are fighting to preserve humankind. The War will be settled by two Chosen Ones, both sons of Gods, brothers in blood, enemies in the battlefield.

name: Hell O Corn
description: Escaping hell of poor little corn who fell into hell in an accident! Hell O Corn is a platformer game that requires accurate control. Break through stages by jumping over obstacles and avoiding enemies.

name: The Parvificent Seven
description: How did the seven dwarfs meet before Snow White appeared in their house? Real time tactics game with heroes like you have never seen before. Specialization, environmental advantages and cooperation. These elements make the game a real challenge!

name: Crazy Drift
description: Crazy Drift is a realistic drifting and racing game that simulates the body physics engine in every component of the car

name: Don't Underestimate Me
description: A 2D bullet hell game in top-down for PC. You can dodge, but can't shoot back. Learn about the stories of unique characters trying to understand each other and solve their personal problems while constantly on the edge of fights.

name: Grimdark Survivors
description: To save your world, take out an expanding horde of monsters. To develop one-of-a-kind and game-breaking builds, select from a selection of upgrades. Unlock a wide variety of characters and weapons with special abilities.

name: Survivors
description: A brand new, reverse-bullet-hell style shooter that you can enjoy with friends! Kill enemies, collect experience, choose your upgrades wisely, rinse/repeat, and Survive.

name: Redactor
description: Take the role of Redactor at Liaise, the world’s largest social media firm in the year 2062. Deal with noisy chat bots, hateful messages, fake news, and anything else that disrupts the fragile social ties in a dystopian world. Can you keep people engaged on the platform without losing your sanity?

name: Operation Satoshi
description: A shooting RPG game to rescue a kidnapped scientist, Nakamoto Satoshi. You are part of a elite unit that is tasked with a search and rescue mission. Travel across multiple regions to find clues and collect rewards along the way.

name: Wee Survivors
description: Blast your way through thousands of aliens in this casual retro inspired shooter. Build your character from an array of weapons and powerful upgrades, which make each new playthrough unique!

name: The Pencil is cast!
description: Fight the greats with a pencil! All you need in this fight is a strong dose of luck! Can you survive against the greats?

name: Lament of Kyoto: Origins
description: Lament of Kyoto is an Action Rogue-lite with light horror elements. Fight endless waves of horrifying yokai while exploring the haunted remains of feudal Japan. Recruit unlikely allies, discover secrets and vanquish powerful bosses to upgrade your weapons and abilities.

name: Chaos in Aisle Seven
description: Chaos in Aisle Seven is a twin-stick top-down shooter where you play as George, a customer who shops for a laptop in a store where salespeople are annoying, greedy and only want to sell useless products and services. Fight back by shouting your displeasure in this satire about shopping!

name: Goofy Neighborhood
description: Goofy Neighbourhood is a comedy adventure set in an alternative and crazy reality of goofy, and sometimes dangerous characters. Play as a detective trying to solve the mystery of the G building.

name: Skid
description: Skid VR is an Open World Bike simulator and Racing game inspired by Road Rash and NFS.

name: Oroboros
description: The world as been shattered by an Oroboros, a mystical creature burried under the earth. Against all odds humanity survived, this event has awoken earth true power, the mountain stones!!! 500 years later, Oroboros still swim in the earth core.

name: Outerra World Sandbox
description: Outerra World Sandbox gives you the whole world to use as canvas to create, explore and share. Create terrain and share it online or download the creations of others and then explore it on foot or in any mode of transportation that you and the community create.

name: SCP: Submerged
description: SCP: Submerged is a story-driven game set in the SCP Universe. Deadly entities are on the lose in the facility, located leagues below the waves of the northern sea.

name: Shields of Asgard
description: The shields of Asgard have been stolen. You have been chosen by Odin to retrieve them. Your first journey takes you to Jotunheim. Travel the vast deep and dark forests. Climb mountains where winter never stops. Fight challenging enemies.

name: Star Rift Saga
description: A modern action platformer with some light RPG elements. Explore a vast interconnected planet. Fight enemies and bosses across multiple biomes. Collect items and upgrades to help you on your quest. Upgrade your abilities, the shop, and the colony itself.

name: Tankettes
description: Bust some tanks in this playful retro arcade-style shooter featuring 24 playable characters!

name: Starlight City
description: Starlight City is an aesthetically dreamy 90s platformer in body and soul! Loud, bright, and colorful, this neon infused visual style coupled with hand pleasing fluid platformer game-feel hits all the right buttons for anyone with that retro itch.

name: Gravity Maze
description: Gravity Maze is physic maze game in which you get balls to the end by changing gravity

name: Think and Co-op
description: Think and work is a cooperative arcade game. The game was designed in such a way that several players could enjoy it at the same time. Land in an icy land or a busy city, it's up to you where you go!

name: Noslrac
description: A casual dungeon crawler ARPG with three unique classes with differing playstyles and distinctive skill trees. Choose your conqueror, level up, slay monsters, complete campaigns, obtain better loot, and gather resources to craft the most customizable and powerful items the game has to offer.

name: Kritter
description: Kritter is a Base Defense Roguelite game with Hack'n'Slash and base building mechanics. In solo or online cooperative mode, fight against hordes of enemies, evolve and repair the wreckage of your spaceship to try to escape an infernal time loop.

name: Rickstones
description: Rickstones is a multiplayer (1 vs 2-8) horror game where one player becomes the Caretaker, while the other players are his student victims trying to escape the grounds... or survive the night in Rickstones School.

name: Gemini Chase
description: Pew Pew, begone pirate scum! Gemini Chase is an VR arcade shooter, inspired by games of the 80s. You are being chased by space pirates and their cohorts. Can you use your weapons effectively to make your escape?

name: Stay Out of the Farm
description: Stay Out Of The Farm is a ps1 styled horror game where you try to escape from serial killer.

name: Downfallen
description: Downfallen is a short adventure game that tells the story of a civilian in a battlefield where everything takes a turn for the worse.

name: Teresa Moontyners: In the lair of the beast
description: Immerse yourself in a fantastic adventure in the snowy Italian Alps. Solve puzzles to find your way out of the tunnels of the Lair of the Beast. You will discover that monsters exist, but they are not the only ones with claws.

name: DoTeam
description: DoTeam is a survival game. You will play an expelled rabbit in the game and live alone in the game world.

name: Vuosterávdnjái
description: There is something sinister brewing in Tana. The evil Chud have executed a diabolical plan that threatens the whole Sámi culture, and it is up to you to stop them. Embark in a journey through Tana, solve problems, experience culture, and encounter mythical creatures.

name: Mei Qi 2021
description: The MeiQi Series is an episodic mystery game. This collection contains all of Season6 and 7,which will be released in 2021,as well as the first episode of Season 8 and a special episode. In total there are 14 chapters. The story continues with the new police officer NanHe and policewoman Haduo.

name: Way of Vulcan
description: Way of Vulcan is a fantasy medieval blacksmithing simulation game.

name: The Mixer
description: The Mixer is a unique take on a rhythm-driven rogue-lite where you create your own custom soundtrack by mixing-and-matching different music loops. Wield your own beat to conquer a dungeon full of rhythmic dangers.

name: Trail of Toads
description: The Forest of Toads has been blighted and you, as the chosen Toad, must use your platforming skills to find the source of the corruption. Trail of Toads is a modern 3D Platformer with its roots deeply tied to the Nintendo 64 era.

name: Off Shore
description: Off Shore is a first person survival horror game with a nautical theme. You must survive while solving puzzles in hopes of being rescued from a derelict lighthouse.

name: The Unfettered
description: Now is the time to take on demonic souls by identifying with the warrior selfness of Lura, heir to the legendary bird. Feel the power within you with The Unfettered.

name: Waifu Museum
description: Waifu Museum is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Piofiore: Episodio 1926 Limited Edition
description: Experience the continuation of each character’s story from Piofiore: Fated Memories in five all-new episodes, a thrilling tale of mystery and murder, and an alternative what-if scenario that sheds new light on a familiar face.

name: Spintires: Chernobyl
description: Sin descripción

name: Puck Man
description: Basic Pac-Man clone for the Sharp MZ-2000 series of computers.

name: Kyofu No Alien
description: Aliens relentlessly attack you. For how long can it be prevented?

name: Space Bee
description:
Space Bees have attacked!
Hit! Aim for the beehive!

name: Friction 90's Arcade Race
description: Sin descripción

name: HellCopter
description: This game is about being a helicopter gunner and you need to take out enemies in buildings without injuring hostages. There are multiple levels with different difficulties.

name: Touge Shakai
description: Touge Shakai (Mountain Pass Society) is an online Touge Racing Game based on Japanese car culture in the 90s. With an emphasis on balance between realism and fun gameplay, the physics are tailored for competitive drift racing, while giving a challenge to all players.

name: Super Mario Starshine
description: Super Mario Starshine is a modification for Super Mario Galaxy 2 that aims to make Sunshine levels playable in the Galaxy 2 engine.

name: Red Sea
description: Red Sea is an intense Real-time Tactics game where you control a small team of vigilantes in increasingly challenging battles. It features a Scriptable Tactics system that mixes auto-battling with manual overrides and has a ton of powerful ability interactions to discover.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Dolce Vita
description:
Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Dolce Vita, the next game in the visual novel series, was announced in 2016. Originally, it was meant to be released on the PS Vita, but Broccoli announced in 2019 that development for the Vita had been cancelled and that it would continue to be developed for the Nintendo Switch.

Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Dolce Vita will be a completely new work, and will feature a new story about the 11 idols at Shining Agency.

name: Kaoamaru Kaiju
description: A short, dark interactive story, where the Kaiju Kaoamaru will arise.

name: Emono
description: You play as Yuri, a 16-year-old teenage girl, living in an industrial city in Japan, 1986. On your way home from school, you go to a store near you to buy groceries for dinner, but you are being followed.

name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - Ghosts of Christmas Passed
description: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark bonus case is playable now! Ghosts of Christmas Passed features Ghosts! And Christmas! And Francis McQueen's definitely-for-real-actually-for-all-time-he's-dead-death. Yes, siree, he's dead as a doornail, he is.

name: Chernobylite: Season 4 - Black Smoke
description: New events: 'Farewell, My Doll' a new game mode, 'Brothers in Arms' and more!

name: WetBread
description: WetBread is a 2.5D Metroidvania Platformer, where you gain control of a Dry Husk, travel thorugh the store shelves of various departments, solve puzzles and fight enemies and bosses.

name: Mega Man X2 Alpha
description: Mega Man X2: Alpha is a WIP modification for Mega Man X - rebalance and stage redesign project for Megaman X2 for the SNES. Within its objective is to enhance the difficulty to provide a fresh new experience to veterans of the platform genre.

name: Untitled Ghost Game
description: Free Multiplayer 2d ghost hunting game with 11 unique ghosts, 3 maps, and 9 items you can use to deduct what ghost you are dealing with. Be careful, or the ghost might get you.

name: Yasuke: A Lost Descendant
description: Bringing Super-Powered Samurai, Parkour Movement and Cultural Diversity into a 3D Anime Action Game.

name: Tsjost's Heroic Soup Bazooka
description:
Solve puzzles by eating foodstuff and pushing boulders.
Can you figure out how to escape?

name: Haneda Girl
description: Haneda Girl is an action-platformer game with brutal and frantic action. Clean stages swapping between two playable characters. Bullets or Slashes, your choice, but be creative. A wide variety of ways to solve each encounter are at your disposal. Dance the waltz of destruction, end the threat.

name: Valorbound
description: Valorbound is a full-loot, sandbox, PvEvP, horizontal progression, MMO-lite set in a highly stylized mid-fantasy setting. With more believable restraints on character power, Valorbound focuses on the smaller scale and more down-to-earth adventures. Survive in a wild world full of Elves, Goblins and magic, and live the fantasy life you've dreamed of.​

name: Project: Eden's Garden
description: Project: Eden's Garden is a non-profit Danganronpa fangame. Taking the formula of the murder-mystery video game and applying it to an entirely new world, with new characters and stories to tell, this is a small project that is dedicated to recreating the magic the works that inspired it.

name: Beyond
description: Beyond is a difficult, action-driven, linear sidescroller with unique combat mechanics. Each level is tied together by an overarching narrative element and progression accumulates in the form of equipment gathered after each completed level. The game is set in an ethereal world filled with magical beasts, warriors, and weapons. The player begins as a Shinigami who needs to collect souls from the inhabitants of said world. Along their quest, they will face off against others with the very same goal.

name: Nova Urbana
description:
Invite your friends to join you in an amazing experience through Nova Urbana’s brazilian inspired suburbs. Discover a new way to play in this physics sandbox city.

In Nova Urbana you can choose between the greatest cars of all time, from the classic Beatle to yellow Camaro.
You can be whatever you want: the best pizza delivery person or a 5 star Driver! The biggest collector or a master of the wheel in the challenges of chrome rims!

name: id Action Pack Vol. 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Paranormal Tales
description: Paranormal Tales is a next-gen horror game based on found footage built in Unreal Engine 5. You experience and play through each tragic tale of those who went missing from the viewpoint of bodycams, phones, and VHS cameras. Do you have what it takes to play through the end of the footage?

name: One Beat Min
description:
One Beat Min is a game in development about music, rhythm, and beatbox battles where players select characters and press buttons on the joystick to create their beat and try to run the opponent.

The game brings the universe of Hip Hop, urban culture, creative freedom, and diversity into a charismatic design.

name: Papu Superstars Racing
description: Papu Superstars is a Free to Play Game where you can play with the characters of the NFT Collections you own, and compete representing your favourite community. A fun, polished and accessible gaming experience for any kind of player, with speed, Drift & Boost, Power-ups, dynamic circuits... The perfect combination and balance to guarantee that both casual and hardcore players can enjoy every second!

name: Mokens League
description: Web3 real-time multiplayer esports using NFTs. Create your unique soccer team and play competitively to win our Tokens. Discover multiple game modes and customization options. Easy to play, hard to master.

name: Shining Star
description: Shining Star is a cancelled strategy game for the Game Boy Advance by Eworks Studios.

name: STG Football
description: Officially licensed by the NFLPA, STG Football is a free-to-play, real-time, arcade football game designed from the ground up to be a true multiplayer game supporting unique 4v4 gameplay that emphasizes teamwork and strategy.

name: Car Chase Simulator
description: Car Chase Simulator is an action driving game heavily inspired by car action scenes of movies from 70s, 80, 90s etc.

name: No Way Back
description: Welcome to the battle-royale genre made for ninjas! Participate in the epic thrilling battles, loot the best weapons and objects in the map to become the king of the battle. Play different game modes like Free-4-All or Team Deathmatch to practise your ninka skills with different weapons.

name: Her Name
description:
A platform and puzzle game, "Her Name" will offer you to solve its puzzles by making your character progress at the same time as a mysterious bead on its tracks.

Days follow each other and look alike in this bleak world where routine afflicts the player in a tasteless and endless vicious circle. Until one day, a warmer aura appears in the dreary life of our character.
But before being able to approach this young woman, the player will have to overcome his fears, his anxieties and his apprehensions through his nightmares. Will a love story manage to hatch between these two souls?

A story full of sadness and loneliness but also of discoveries, encounters, mutual aid and love.

name: Icons of Theia
description: Icons of Theia is a Tactical RPG for Android and ioS. Collect and develop unique hero characters, bring your Icons to compete in 1v1 tactical turn-based strategy matches and use simple tools to create your own maps, skins, and game modes

name: Rally Racing 2
description: Race against other opponents in this low-poly stylized environment. Pay attention to the pist. Choose your favorite car, race in a construction zone and win.

name: FiveSeven
description: A horror game from the creators of Umurangi Generation.

name: Sea Boy
description: Sea Boy is a cancelled puzzle-platformer for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Laggy Fantasy Tactics
description:
LFT is a modification of Final Fantasy Tactics, making some dramatic changes to its gameplay while preserving non-gameplay aspects (the story, characters, etc. have all been left unmodified).

LFT has three main goals:
1. To improve the usability and balance in all aspects of gameplay, without removing options or impeding on personal preference whenever possible. (classes, items, etc.)
2. To reduce the necessity of grind and other tedious aspects of the game. (faster JP gain, easier class unlocks, better poaches, etc.)
3. To streamline the game's difficulty so that it remained challenging to a player who previously played FFT, without forcing optimization or any extraneous leveling.

name: Rocket Monsters
description: Rocket Monsters is a Free to Play blockchain game built on Unreal Engine 5. The Rocket Monsters Universe is filled with a variety of characters, weapons, and vehicles which are all player owned. Engage in PVP and PVE across multiple areas with endless possibilities. Experience a robust game economy where players will be introduced to vibrant and meaningful gameplay! We are the next evolution, A player centered Universe.

name: Running With Rifles: Eastern Front
description:
Running With Rifles: Eastern Front is the third and final expansion to the highly rated, top-down tactical shooter Running With Rifles

In Running With Rifles: Eastern Front, take the fight to the Eastern theater of the second World War and battle over the expansive steppe, from the streets of the smallest rural villages to the ruins of the largest industrial factories, and prepare to fight for every inch with blood and iron!

Journey across some of the most famous locations of the Eastern front, including Stalingrad, Kursk, Berlin, and more, all based on the historical terrain where these clashes occurred. Take part in two unique campaigns, as the Soviet Union or as the Axis Forces. Will you strike back at the invaders alongside the Red Army, or strive for a rapid victory with the Wehrmacht? Make history or change it - it's up to you.

Just remember that to win this war, you’ll need to hit the banks of the Volga running - with rifles.

name: RavenQuest
description:
In RavenQuest, the world is yours to conquer! Claim a plot of land anywhere to build your own house & farm, collect Ravencards to further customize your unique character, gather resources to craft powerful weapons and battle other players in a truly open-world experience.

RavenQuest you can have your own piece of Land (NFTs), where you can generate income, or harvest material for to deliver tradepacks (Generate Gold) with your MOAs (NFTs), Wagons (NFTs), or even with Ships (NFTs), navigating on the seas, or you can have Ravencards (NFTs) that can be equipped in your character, making him stronger, competing in PvP, Arenas or join with your friends to battle in large scale Guild Wars.

Virtually any In-Game activity will offer some amount of Gold Coins to the player. There is no monotony in how the players earn these coins - they can choose the activity that most entertains them and can alternate between several different activities as well. Gold Coins can be exchanged for our Blockchain Token (Sunbreak Token - $SBT).

Depending on your NFTs, you can increase your Gold Production (Later exchanged for Token), you can also use your Ravencards that are NFTs, to increase the battle capabilities your character, you can deliver tradepacks with your Mounts, that are NFTs, to engage in the main revenue in the game. Your Sunbreak Tokens - $SBT, can be used to acquire new NFTs, like Ravencards, but they also are used in-game activities, like craft, upgrade or repairing equipment.
